# We're crowdfunding!

::: text-center
To make the game available in Tasmania and worldwide and to run our engagement activities we are launching a **crowdfunding** campaign. Currently the game is not available for sale and you can only get it through crowdfunding. 

By pledging to this campaign you will secure your copy of the game and support education and engagement activities on marine science and sustainable recreational fishing. The campaign will launch on **September 15, 2024**.
